mapper.select: select * from running_eating.message where content like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%') or sendTo like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%') or `from` like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%') limit #{startIndex},#{limit}

select count(*) from running_eating.message where content like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%') or sendTo like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%') or `from` like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{bluer}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into running_eating.message(message.id, message.title, message.`from`, message.sendTo, message.date, message.messageType, message.content, message.imagePath ,message.userId) values (replace(uuid(), '-', ''), #{title}, #{from}, #{sendTo}, #{date}, #{messageType}, #{content}, #{imagePath}, #{userId})
